name: Let Me Out (itch) (Pete Mahilary)
description:
This is a Horror Game made in 5days for Brackey's Game Jam 2. Please share your feedback!

I am a programmer, not a good designer. 

Assets is taken from below link:

Environment: This work is based on "Japan Self-Defense Forces Military Base kit" (https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/japan-self-defense-forces-military-base-kit-77da87c27b784fa1951f187642b4d3fd) by Plevako (https://sketchfab.com/Plevako) licensed under CC-BY-SA-4.0 (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/)

Monster:  This work is based on "Human-zergling" (https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/human-zergling-95bcd72dac2d4be6a7085a7810f55838) by Elisey (https://sketchfab.com/dwelfster) licensed under CC-BY-4.0 (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

Generator: This work is based on "Generator LP" (https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/generator-lp-9127ac84a3c84d56be6e3993ed350eff) by YoeriBervoets (https://sketchfab.com/YoeriBervoets) licensed under CC-BY-4.0 (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

Cells: This work is based on "Power Cell" (https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/power-cell-76c8d5a567544d3a95f60ad2a45fcbec) by Alterae (https://sketchfab.com/Alterae) licensed under CC-BY-4.0 (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

Sounds: freesound.org
